channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Oscars 2025: The complete list of winners
item.description: The 97th Academy Awards are underway at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood, Calif. Find out who is taking home an Oscar.
item.content:encoded:
The 97th Academy Awards are underway at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood, Calif. Find out who is taking home an Oscar.

(Image credit: Patrick T. Fallon)
item.dc:creator: Dhanika Pineda

item.title: UK prime minister unveils steps toward a Ukraine peace deal, urges US cooperation
item.description: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer pledged more military aid, as well as the possibility of weapons and boots on the ground, to secure peace in Ukraine.
item.content:encoded:
British Prime Minister Keir Starmer pledged more military aid, as well as the possibility of weapons and boots on the ground, to secure peace in Ukraine.

(Image credit: WPA Pool)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: How Washington is reacting to the heated Trump-Zelenskyy meeting
item.description: Trump adviser Mike Waltz says the U.S. has "a real issue on our hands" if Ukrainian President Zelenskyy doesn't come back to negotiating table in its war with Russia.
item.content:encoded:
Trump adviser Mike Waltz says the U.S. has "a real issue on our hands" if Ukrainian President Zelenskyy doesn't come back to negotiating table in its war with Russia.

(Image credit: Mstyslav Cherno)
item.dc:creator: Luke Garrett

item.title: Pakistan is out of its own cricket tournament, but its fans are still excited to host
item.description: The country is hosting a major international cricket tournament for the first time in a generation. It's a much-needed bright spot in a nation that's confronted recent economic and political crises.
item.content:encoded:
The country is hosting a major international cricket tournament for the first time in a generation. It's a much-needed bright spot in a nation that's confronted recent economic and political crises.

(Image credit: Fadel Senna)
item.dc:creator: Betsy Joles

item.title: GOP congressman Lawler says "only winner" in tense Trump-Zelenskyy summit was Putin
item.description: NPR's Ayesha Rascoe talks with Rep. Mike Lawler, R-N.Y., about U.S.-Ukraine policy following Friday's combative meeting between Presidents Trump and Zelenskyy.
item.content:encoded:
NPR's Ayesha Rascoe talks with Rep. Mike Lawler, R-N.Y., about U.S.-Ukraine policy following Friday's combative meeting between Presidents Trump and Zelenskyy.

(Image credit: Mystyslav Chernov)
item.dc:creator: Ayesha Rascoe

item.title: Israel halts all aid to Gaza, delays negotiations for phase two of the ceasefire
item.description: As phase one of the ceasefire expires, Israel is halting all aid into Gaza.
item.content:encoded: As phase one of the ceasefire expires, Israel is halting all aid into Gaza.
item.dc:creator: Hadeel Al-Shalchi

item.title: UK, France and Ukraine agree to work on ceasefire plan for Russia's war in Ukraine
item.description: Britain, France and Ukraine have agreed to work on a ceasefire plan to present to the U.S., British Prime Minister Keir Starmer said Sunday as he prepared to host a summit of European leaders.
item.content:encoded:
Britain, France and Ukraine have agreed to work on a ceasefire plan to present to the U.S., British Prime Minister Keir Starmer said Sunday as he prepared to host a summit of European leaders.

(Image credit: Peter Nicholls)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: What will Trump say in his Tuesday address? We look to the past for some clues
item.description: Delivered the day before he was acquitted in his first impeachment case, and as COVID began to spread, President Trump's 2020 address was part reality TV, part gameshow and part WWE smackdown.
item.content:encoded:
Delivered the day before he was acquitted in his first impeachment case, and as COVID began to spread, President Trump's 2020 address was part reality TV, part gameshow and part WWE smackdown.

(Image credit: Sarah Silbiger)
item.dc:creator: Tamara Keith

item.title: "We're on the moon": private Blue Ghost spacecraft makes an historic lunar landing
item.description: A commercial spacecraft carrying NASA experiments successfully touched down on the moon's surface early Sunday morning, ushering in a new phase of private space exploration.
item.content:encoded:
A commercial spacecraft carrying NASA experiments successfully touched down on the moon's surface early Sunday morning, ushering in a new phase of private space exploration.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: Joe Hernandez

item.title: Israel stops the delivery of aid to Gaza until Hamas accepts U.S. ceasefire extension
item.description: Israel says it is stopping the delivery of aid to Gaza until Hamas accepts a U.S. proposal for an extension of the ceasefire deal.
item.content:encoded:
Israel says it is stopping the delivery of aid to Gaza until Hamas accepts a U.S. proposal for an extension of the ceasefire deal.

(Image credit: Eyad Baba)
item.dc:creator: Daniel Estrin
